name: Tap Jewels
description:
Tap Jewels is a tile based puzzle game where the player has to click on groups of same coloured gems to remove them from the board. There are three different game modes: puzzle quest, time challenge and survival. The first two are available in the free version while the survival mode requires the paid full version.

In the puzzle quest mode groups of two or more gems can be removed from the board but new gems are only added to the board when groups of three or more gems are removed. The game ends when no more removals can be made. In the time challenge mode groups of three or more gems has to be removed and by being quick more time is added. The game ends when there is no more time left. In the survival mode the player has live energy that goes down when groups of less than three gems are removed but increases when four or more gems are removed. The game ends when the player is out of live energy. Special items can appear in all game modes and include color changers, row cleaners, column cleaners and cross cleaners.
alsoFor: Android, BlackBerry, iPad, iPhone, Windows Phone | Combined View
gamePlay: Falling block puzzle, Tile matching puzzle
